Interface JavaMailAdapter

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
JavaMailAdapterImpl, MockJavaMailAdapter
public interface JavaMailAdapter
extends org.springframework.mail.javamail.JavaMailSender

An adapter to provide initialization data to the JavaMailSender through an Supervisor instance.
